import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Order.css'; import axios from 'axios'; export default class Order extends Component { Close = false; ClosePopup = ()=>{ this.props.Close = true; } createOrder = ()=>{ const data={ "itemDesc":document.getElementById('orderItems').Value, "itemPrice":document.getElementById('totalPrice').Value, "itemImage":document.getElementById('itemImage').Value, }; axios.post('http://94.127.209.194:3333/AudioGramServices/webapi/myresource/postmenu', data) .then(response=>{ this.props.clearOrder() console.log(response) }) } render() { return (
    {this.props.items.map(item=>{ const img =item.itemImage!=null? {backgroundimage:'url(${item.itemImage})'}:{} return(
  • Price {item.itemPrice} JD
    • )})}
